name: Aumaton
description:
Living an average life, clocking in for another night of your shift, at Aumaton University!

This title revisits the age of keyboard-only controls with exceptionally low-poly graphics. Prepare for a short experience in your billboard nightmares.

Project for Scream Jam 2021.



[The paper reads...] 
Tip: If you complete the game and want to experience it again, look for a rat in your documents.
